Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly valued by many of our customers. It's a unique opportunity to own something that has been meticulously crafted and offers exceptional quality. Considering its value and benefits, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you for $180. This price reflects the product's worth and ensures you receive the best possible deal. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let me know if you're interested! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
